remarks: A well-ordering induces a strict ordering on the power set. _EDITORIAL_: when well-orderings are set like, this can be strengthened to remove ` A e. V ` .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Jan-2015.)
statement:
wepwso.t $e |- T = { <. x , y >. | E. z e. A ( ( z e. y /\ -. z e. x ) /\ A. w e. A ( w R z -> ( w e. x <-> w e. y ) ) ) } $.
wepwso $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ R We A ) -> T Or ~P A ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d R w x y z $.
$d w x y z $.
